p: Thus, in vitro screening of the extracts (root and aerial parts) showed a time- and dose-dependent inhibition of the cell growth on breast carcinoma T47D cell line ( Abdolmohammadi et al., 2008; Tan et al., 2005). Although root extract shows higher anticancer activity in comparison to the extract of aerial part ( Abdolmohammadi et al., 2008). But, aerial parts extract of A. orientalis, contrary to A. persicus, , had higher effects on inducing apoptosis on T47D cell line compared to the root extract ( Abdolmohammadi et al., 2009).
